description: Deregisters the specified instances from the specified load balancer. After the instance is deregistered, it no longer receives traffic from the load balancer. You can use  DescribeLoadBalancers to verify that the instance is deregistered from the load balancer. For more information, see Register or De-Register EC2 Instances in the Classic Load Balancers Guide.

parameters.name: LoadBalancerName
parameters.description: The name of the load balancer.

parameters.name: Instances
parameters.description: The IDs of the instances. (dict) --- The ID of an EC2 instance. InstanceId (string) --- The instance ID.

nested_items.name: Instances
nested_items.description: The remaining instances registered with the load balancer.
